title: Explore 4 Different Types of Love in the Bible
text:
• 5 Reasons You Can Be Sure God Loves You 
If you've ever experienced the intense suffering that Job endured , you have probably asked this question: "Does God love me?" Maybe you've gone through heartbreaking loss , long-term illness, or a devastating betrayal. You know what it means to wrestle with doubts about God's love. Oftentimes it's difficult to feel God's love and sense his presence. Every believer is likely to experience some doubt along this journey of faith.For this reason God left us with countless assurances of his love in the pages of the Bible . • How to Love Like Jesus All of us want to love like Jesus. We want to be generous, forgiving, and compassionate enough to love people unconditionally. But no matter how hard we try, somehow we fall short. Our humanness gets in the way. Learn the secret to loving like Jesus by abiding in him. More » • Find Love That Changes Everything 
Can you find love on the Internet? Millions of people believe you can. They want to click a mouse and discover lifelong bliss. In the real world, however, it’s not that easy to find love, unless we turn to someplace unexpected: God. When you find love from God, you find pure, unconditional, indestructible, eternal love . More »
